alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Morgan; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Oconee, north central Morgan, central Clarke, northeastern Walton and west central Oglethorpe Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over North High Shoals, or near Watkinsville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Watkinsville, Athens, Bogart, North High Shoals, Bostwick, Good Hope, Bishop, Athens-Clarke County, Whitehall, Beechwood Hills, Eastville, Barnett Shoals, State Botanical Garden Of Ga and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
